patterns.pattern: Your momentum dies off.
Your body is still recovering from its last boost of momentum.
You bow your head, concentrating and matching your heartbeat to the vibrations of the earth beneath you. When you raise your eyes, you feel your body ready to strike.
You use Wavebreaking Hightide.
The benefits of the high tide ebb away.
Your body has recovered from its increased momentum.
Your body is able to benefit from another high tide.
You are unable to absorb another affliction so soon.

As you lift your arms overhead, the dust and earth around you rise up, collecting in a cloud about your person. The cloud thickens and cakes over your flesh, and when it falls away, you feel healthier.
You use Wavebreaking Yearn.
You use Terramancy Absorb.
The sea will not respond to your yearning again so soon.
You may once more absorb an affliction from your flesh.
You may once again yearn for the sea to lend you its succour.
You may once again strengthen your will.
You have already solidified your will with that of your golem.
You may once again work in tandem with your elemental.
Your imbue_will defence has been stripped.
Your elemental_engulf defence has been stripped.
You are still recovering from the last time you solidified your will with that of your golem.
You cannot coordinate with your elemental again so soon.
You must be with your golem to do that.
^The stones rip apart (\w+)'s (\w+) defence\.$
^The riptide washes away (\w+)'s (\w+) defence\.$
^As (\w+) parries the blow, a synthetic crystal elemental enacts a vengeful reprisal, leaving.+ reeling and vulnerable\.$
^.+ lashes out as (\w+) parries the blow, rattling.+ defences\.$
Your elemental has recovered from its former reprisal and may enact another, should opportunity present.
Your golem has regained its awareness to rattle.
Your golem has regained its awareness to grapple.
Your elemental has regained the strength to clutch another victim.
